msg: Eliminate another instance of errors being missused as part of the
standard control flow.  Again, this not only improves ST performance
but MT speed / scalability even more so.
(open_path_flags_t): Define flag that lets open_path return a
NULL result instead of an error.
(fs_closest_copy): Use open_path with the new flag and we can
